title: Tuna Noodle Casserole
directions: Step 2:	Cook noodles according to package directions, omitting salt and fat.
Step 4:	Heat a large skillet over medium heat.
Step 5:	Add oil to pan; swirl to coat.
Step 6:	Add onion and carrot; cook 6 minutes or until carrot is almost tender, stirring occasionally.
Step 7:	Sprinkle with flour; cook 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Step 8:	Gradually stir in milk; cook 5 minutes, stirring constantly with a whisk until slightly thick.
Step 9:	Stir in cream cheese, mustard, salt, and pepper; cook 2 minutes, stirring constantly.
Step 11:	Stir in noodles, peas, 1/4 cup Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, and tuna.
Step 12:	Spoon mixture into a shallow broiler-safe 2-quart baking dish coated with cooking spray; top with remaining 1/4 cup Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.
Step 13:	Broil 3 minutes or until golden and bubbly.
Step 14:	Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
